DERBY-4679 Several left outer joins causes unstable query with incorrect results
Follow-up patch derby-4679-2a, which makes the new (tn, cn) based remapping work also for a CR to a subquery join participant being rebound after flattening, see detailed comments in the code. Extra test cases are added to JoinTest#testDerby_4679.
Merged to 10.6 branch as
svn merge -c 958618 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk
